data.name: Crest - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Enjoy the vibes of Crest now on the go as well. A full packed high quality soundtrack composed by Roland Kock & Tuomas Nikkinen brings you 14 songs from the game, 5 unused bonus songs and additionally another 6 songs from our trailers adding up to a total playing time of 49:08!

Crest OST
01. "Roland Koch - South Wind" 01:47
02. "Roland Koch - North Wind" 01:35
03. "Roland Koch - Creation Myth" 01:06
04. "Roland Koch - Metamorphosis" 01:51
05. "Roland Koch - Times Breath" 01:42
06. "Tuomas Nikkinen - Farewell" 03:38
07. "Tuomas Nikkinen - Golden Age" 03:56
08. "Tuomas Nikkinen - Nightfall" 02:54
09. "Tuomas Nikkinen - Wayfarers" 03:02
10. "Tuomas Nikkinen - Dunes" 03:28
11. "Tuomas Nikkinen - Warrior Spirit" 02:55
12. "Tuomas Nikkinen - Prophets" 03:41
13. "Tuomas Nikkinen - Underworld" 02:55
14. "Tuomas Nikkinen - End of Journey" 01:52

Playing time: 36:29

Bonus Songs
01. "Roland Koch - Crest" 01:00
02. "Roland Koch - Crest 1992" 01:36
03. "Roland Koch - Warm Breeze" 00:24
04. "Roland Koch - Spirits" 00:29
05. "Roland Koch - Plenty" 00:51

Playing time: 04:20

Trailer Songs
01. "Tuomas Nikkinen - Cinematic Launch Trailer" 01:10
02. "Tuomas Nikkinen - Community Trailer" 01:08
03. "Tuomas Nikkinen - Exploration Trailer" 01:32
04. "Roland Koch - Faith Trailer" 01:04
05. "Roland Koch - City States Trailer" 01:37
06. "Roland Koch - Golden Path Trailer" 01:48

Playing time: 08:19

Total Playing Time: 49:08



To access the soundtrack's files after purchase go to the same folder where you can find Crest (Game Library>Properties>Browse Local Files...).

data.short_description: Enjoy the vibes of Crest now on the go as well. A full packed high quality soundtrack composed by Roland Kock & Tuomas Nikkinen brings you 14 songs from the game, 5 unused bonus songs and additionally another 6 songs from our trailers adding up to a total playing time of 49:08!Crest OST01. "Roland Koch - South Wind" 01:4702.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 graphics memory and shader model 2.0 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion 10.7 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 graphics memory and shader model 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 graphics memory and shader model 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
